title: How to Make a Taurus Man Miss You After a Breakup

steps.title: Taurus men have a deep appreciation for beauty.
steps.content: Taurus men have a deep appreciation for beauty. [1] X Research source Putting some extra work in your appearance will make him realize what he’s missing out on. Put on your best outfit, try out a new haircut, or dance around to your favorite song! Your confidence is radiating, and that glow will have him missing you before you know it. Take a selfie and post it on social media. Show off your outfit, hair, and confident energy!

steps.title: Taurus men respond well to physical touch.
steps.content: Taurus men respond well to physical touch. If you’re in close proximity with your ex, try finding moments where you can physically touch him. Being rather quiet, Taurus men do not easily express themselves verbally. However, they are extremely affectionate and prefer to show their love physically. [2] X Research source If you know stepping into his personal bubble won’t make things more awkward, try grabbing his attention by: [3] X Research source Hug him when you greet him and say goodbye. Sit next to him. Pat his hand or shove his shoulder playfully to get his attention.

steps.title: Taurus men can be possessive and get jealous easily.
steps.content: Taurus men can be possessive and get jealous easily. [4] X Research source You can use these traits to your advantage by making him miss your attention. Show him that he isn’t the only guy you have in your life! Share on social media that you’re hanging out with friends. Take a photo and tag everyone! This will grab your ex’s attention and have him realizing that you have plenty of options.

steps.title: Start up a conversation that will have him missing talking to you.
steps.content: Start up a conversation that will have him missing talking to you. A Taurus man is less likely to reach out even after the initial breakup because of his stubborn nature. If the time is right, extend the olive branch! Even a simple “Hey!” will have your name popping up. If it’s been awhile since you’ve talked, ask him how he is. Taurus men are career driven and enjoy talking about their goals. [5] X Research source Open the floor for a conversation he can easily slide into.

steps.title: You’re beautiful, and you want him to miss that gorgeous smile!
steps.content: You’re beautiful, and you want him to miss that gorgeous smile! Whether you’re all dolled up or having a good time, send him a picture to remind him what he should be missing. Take a selfie before a night out with friends. Having your friends in the picture with you is a bonus! He’ll feel like he’s missing out on a good time and wish he was there with you. If you have a pet, take a selfie with them! A cute animal is sure to make any guy miss you even more. When in doubt, just smile! You don’t need fancy clothes or makeup to take a gorgeous picture. You are perfect just the way you are!

steps.title: Use language that centers around your emotions.
steps.content: Use language that centers around your emotions. Taurus men are good listeners but sometimes need a gentle push to start a deeper conversation. [6] X Research source Open up about your feelings and share that you miss him. By expressing your emotions, you open the door for him to miss you despite his stubborn nature. Here are some thoughts you can rephrase: Instead of asking, “Don’t you miss me?” say, “I miss you.” Instead of saying, “It feels like you’re ignoring me,” try, “I’ve been thinking about you.”

steps.title: Work on yourself to get your ex to miss you.
steps.content: Work on yourself to get your ex to miss you. Taurus men value self-sufficient, strong, and confident partners. [7] X Research source Breakups can be hard, but think of this as an opportunity to be with yourself. The confidence that comes with focusing on your needs and well-being can make your ex miss you even more! Here are some ways to improve your mental health: Connect with a past friend or family member and make social connection a priority. Go to source Spend time away from your ex by exploring new and past relationships. Stay active. Find a form of exercise that brings you joy, whether it be taking a walk, riding a bike, doing yoga, or going for a jog. Getting a good night’s sleep is a proven way to reduce stress and increase overall health. steps.title: Cutting off communication will disrupt his routine and get him thinking about you.
steps.content: Cutting off communication will disrupt his routine and get him thinking about you. Taurus men don’t like change. If he’s used to the two of you talking all the time and then suddenly doesn’t hear from you, he’ll start wondering where you’ve been. [11] X Research source Give him space. By staying out of his way, you are giving him a chance to miss you while he organizes his thoughts. If he reaches out to you, don’t respond right away! If you’re readily available for him, he won’t have time to miss you. Let him realize that he wants to talk to you. [12] X Research source Reader Poll: We asked 1534 wikiHow readers who've broken up with Taurus men, and 56% of them agreed that the best way to approach them after a breakup is by giving them space and waiting for them to reach out. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Taurus men are attracted to those who make them feel safe and comfortable.
steps.content: Taurus men are attracted to those who make them feel safe and comfortable. Tread the waters of your breakup carefully, but don’t abandon him. A Taurus man is extremely loyal, and he values his relationships. [13] X Research source More often than not, he doesn’t want to lose his relationship with you completely. Make him miss your romantic affections, but stay true to friendship by: Reminding him you will be there for him. Telling him you care about him as a person. Sharing his values and showing stability and respect.

steps.title: You do not need to change yourself for any man!
steps.content: You do not need to change yourself for any man! Taurus men are attracted to self-sufficient people who are not people pleasers. [14] X Research source Don’t change anything about yourself just to make him miss you. Be your authentic self and show him what he’s missing out on! There is only one you in this universe, and any guy would be silly not to miss you.

steps.title: Play hard to get by showing him you don’t miss him.
steps.content: Play hard to get by showing him you don’t miss him. Stay busy by hanging out with friends, exploring new hobbies, and/or traveling. Give him a chance to miss you and all the amazing things you have to offer! Actively pursue your hobbies and try something new. Start attending a dance class, go for a hike, or try your hand at pottery. Exploring old and new passions will keep your mind off the breakup while showing him just how amazing you are.
